_README.description: Model metadata for Zhipu AI GLM API access.
_README.usage: Models listed here are exposed directly through the Zhipu AI provider. Aliases are case-insensitive.

field_descriptions.aliases: Array of short names users can type instead of the full model name
field_descriptions.context_window: Total number of tokens the model can process (input + output combined)
field_descriptions.max_output_tokens: Maximum number of tokens the model can generate in a single response
field_descriptions.supports_extended_thinking: Whether the model supports extended reasoning tokens
field_descriptions.supports_function_calling: Whether the model supports function/tool calling
field_descriptions.supports_images: Whether the model can process images/visual input
field_descriptions.supports_temperature: Whether the model accepts temperature parameter in API calls
field_descriptions.temperature_constraint: Type of temperature constraint: 'fixed', 'range', 'discrete', or omit for default range
field_descriptions.friendly_name: Display name for the model in UI and logs

models.description: Latest GLM model with 200K context and enhanced reasoning capabilities
GLM-4.5: Advanced model with 128K context, optimized for tool use and software engineering
